snippet: The interest in stateside I.P.O.’s of Chinese Internet companies is a striking contrast with the recent past, when accounting scams and poor governance prompted many to shun Chinese stocks.
abstract: The interest in stateside I.P.O.’s of Chinese Internet companies is a striking contrast with the recent past, when accounting scams and poor governance prompted many to shun Chinese stocks.

headline.main: U.S. Investors Brush Aside Fears About Chinese Internet Companies
